summary: An ex-soldier storms into a supermarket and takes all the cashiers hostage because one of them insulted his grandmother.
cast: Branka Katic|Srdjan 'Zika' Todorovic|Dubravka Mijatovic|Danilo Lazovic|Goran Radakovic|Mirjana Karanovic|Nikola Simic|Zorka Manojlovic|Marko Jeremic|Emir Kusturica|Goran Susljik|Milos Samolov|Bozidar Stosic|Djordje Brankovic|Branko Cvejic|Stela Cetkovic|Dimitrije Stojanovic|Kristina Lalicki|Milan Djordjevic|Mihajlo Simonovic|Jelena Skondric|Snezana Jeremic|Barbara Milanov|Sandra Vlatkovic|Karolina Popaz|Dijana Jovicic|Nina Grahovac|Bojan Lojkovic|Jelena Vukusic|Vladimir Balascak|Nenad Okanovic|Zarko Lazic|Dimitrije Jovanovic
title: Jagoda u supermarketu
